org.jasig.portlet.courses.degreeprogress.service.banner

Class BannerDegreeProgramDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.portlet.courses.degreeprogress.service.banner.BannerDegreeProgramDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBannerDegreeProgramDao, IDegreeProgramDao

    public class BannerDegreeProgramDaoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBannerDegreeProgramDao
    Extracts the user's degree summary information, as well as the program information. An implementation of the degree program DAO.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0, 2012-02-07
    Author:
    Aaron Grant

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  BannerDegreeProgramDaoImpl.ProgramComponentExtractor
      Extracts program component information from a result set queried from the database.
      protected class  BannerDegreeProgramDaoImpl.ProgramExtractor
      Extracts degree summary information from a result set queried from the database.
      protected class  BannerDegreeProgramDaoImpl.ProgramInfoExtractor
      Extracts program information from a result set queried from the database.
